BBEX3.M.GHC.EUR.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Ghana / EUR 1 = GHC ... (buying)

General: With effect from 1 July 2007, a currency conversion took place at the rate of 10,000 cedi (GHC) = 1 Ghana cedi (GHS). The currency conversion did not entail any appreciation or depreciation against other currencies.
Source: Ghana Commercial Bank and Bank of Ghana, Accra.

Comment on 1999-01: Data on euro exchange rates are available from 31 March 1999 onwards. The quoted value was calculated on the basis of the D-Mark exchange rate in conjunction with the euro exchange rate of EUR 1 = DEM 1.95583.

Comment on 1999-02: Data on euro exchange rates are available from 31 March 1999 onwards. The quoted value was calculated on the basis of the D-Mark exchange rate in conjunction with the euro exchange rate of EUR 1 = DEM 1.95583.
Comment on 2002-11: Exchange rate as of 26 November 2002.
